loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis Alberto D. C. P.  D. 33 años D. edad es un habitante D. Puerto Colombia, un municipio a la orilla del Mar Caribe, donD.  vive con su esposa y su hijo D. 6 años D. edad, con el que sueña verlo convertido en un  profesional exitoso; Luis Alberto  tiene un negocio en el barrio El Porvenir D. la ciudad D. Barranquilla, llamado “Tienda y Salsamentaría Surtiya Norte”, donD. venD. productos e insumos para la preparación D. comidas rápidas, como salsas, carnes frías, queso y desechables; él tiene como su principal desafío ampliar su capital, para obtener descuentos por pago efectivo y por mayor volumen D. compra. Su meta más adelante es ubicar otro punto comercial en el corredor universitario D. la ciudad D. Barranquilla y comprar un vehículo para atender los pedidos a domicilio  oportunamente.  Luis Alberto  en su negocio maneja  una competencia fuerte,  a la que responD. exitosamente mediante  una oferta D. productos y servicios D. calidad y ofreciendo precios muy competitivos, con  eso se sostiene en el mercado y maneja un margen D. utilidad  promedia no menor a  un 20% y con una rotación D. inventarios D. 10 días. Este es el primer financiamiento 	que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y con el comprará   carnes frías, salsas, productos desechables, queso, verduras y panes pues se acercan días feriados que aumentan el potencial D. ventas y Luis Alberto debe estar preparado para ello.
texts.en: Luis Alberto D. C. P.  is 33 years old and a resident of Puerto Colombia, a town on the shores of the Carribbean. He lives there with his wife and 6 year old son, whom he dreams of seeing become a successful professional. Luis Alberto has a business in the neighborhood of El Porvenir in the city of Barranquilla, called “Tienda y Salsamentaría Surtiya Norte”, where he sells products and ingredients for the preparation of fast food, such as sauces, cold cuts, cheese and disposable products. His main challenge is growing his capital to get discounts for paying upfront and having a higher volume of purchase. His goal in the future is to have another sales locale in the university corridor in the city of Barranquilla, and to buy a vehicle to fill delivery orders quickly. Luis Alberto deals with strong competition in his business and is able to respond successfully by offering quality products and services and competitive products. In this way, he maintains himself in the market and has an average profit margin of  20% with a 10 day inventory turnover. This is his first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and with it, he will buy cold cuts, sauces, disposable products, cheese and bread. Some holidays are coming up and the sales potential increases. Luis Alberto has to be ready for it.

loans.use: to buy cols cuts, sauces, disposable products, cheese, vegetables and bread.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en:
Harriet is a 34-year-old single woman living in a permanent house in Kyenjojo, Uganda. She is very hardworking and has the responsibility of looking after her three children aged 17,14 and 4 years old. Harriet's desire is to educate them to higher institutions of learning.

Harriet has 8 years experience in selling soft drinks. The business is very feasible although it has the challenge of limited capital. Nevertheless Harriet has been able to reap profits and wants to become a wholesale trader. Harriet intends to invest the loan in buying soft drinks for selling.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks.

loans.name: Olger Augusto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “OLLANTAY DE WAYRACPUNCU”; Este banco está ubicado en la Provincia de Urubamba y  departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Olger; es casado; la socia tiene 70 años de edad; la socia tiene 5 hijos el socio alterna sus diferentes actividades, el socio tiene terrenos de cultivo y en los cuales el siembra maíz, papa, el luego vende el choclo al por mayor, el socio también se dedica a críar animales y tiene ganados vacas lecheras, el socio invierte en la alimentación y vitaminas de los mismos para obtener mejor resultado en cuanto a la producción de leche de vaca, el socio vende la leche de vaca al por mayor a una entidad llamada el “Prona”, ellos dan leche a los comedores escolares nacionales; el socio desea invertir el crédito en la compra de semillas para una nueva temporada de siembra de maíz y papa. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar maíz y papa.

El socio está muy agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho préstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Sr. Olger is a member of the Communal Bank “Ollantay de Wayracpuncu” which is located in Urubamba Province, Department of Cusco.

He is 70 years old, married, and has five children. Olger divides his time among various activities. He has land on which he grows corn and potatoes. The corn kernels are eventually sold in bulk. He also raises animals and has dairy cows. Olger invests in feed and vitamins for his cows in order to obtain good results with the milk they produce. He sells the milk in bulk to an entity called “Prona” which distributes it to school cafeterias all over the country. Olger wants to invest this loan in the purchase of seeds for a new season of planting corn and potatoes. Therefore, he is requesting a loan to buy the seeds for planting these crops.

He is very grateful for the loan and promises to complete his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for planting corn and potatoes.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es: Cirila de 39 años, natural del distrito de Quimbiri, es una mujer muy  trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Cirilo de 47 años y sus 04 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Junto a su esposo, Cirila trabaja todos los días en sus tierras, que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado que sus tierras sean muy productivas. Siembra de todo un poco, entre ellos el cacao, café, y maní  pues sabe que todo producto que obtenga será de calidad y son vendidos en el mercado de San Francisco. Lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y menciona que la parte que más gusta es cuidar sus sembríos de la plaga de insectos que pueden perjudicar en el desarrollo de sus plantas, sin embargo el tener que transportar sus cultivos le resulta muy difícil. Para el futuro de su negocio, espera juntar el dinero necesario para comprar nuevas tierras. Este es su 12avo crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudará mucho en el desarrollo de su actividad. En su banco comunal es una socia, muy responsable, de lo cual se siente muy orgullosa. Con el crédito solicitado, comprará trampas para insectos e insecticidas para combatir la plaga que perjudica sus frutos.
texts.en:
Cirila is 39 years of age and a local of Quimbiri. She is a very hardworking woman who lives in her own home with her husband Cirilo, 47, and her four beloved children to whom she wants to offer a better quality of life.

Together with her husband, Cirila works every day on the land and through her efforts she has created very productive crops. She plants a bit of everything, including cocoa, coffee and nuts, as she knows that every vegetable that she grows will be of good quality which she can later sell in the market of San Francisco. Cirila and her husband have spent twenty years in this line of work and what she likes the most is protecting her plantations from insect plagues that can be detrimental to the plants' development. Nevertheless, having to transport the crops is very difficult for her. Cirila hopes to be able to get the necessary funds together to purchase new plots of land for the future of her business. 

This is Cirila's twelfth loan with MFP and their support helps her to develop her business. She is very proud to be a responsible member of her community bank. With the loan that she is applying for she will purchase insect traps and insecticide to combat the insect plague that damages her fruit.

loans.use: to purchase traps and insecticide

loans.name: Aboubakar

texts.fr: Père d’01 enfant, Mr  O. est marié à une revendeuse. Il a 30ans et est ferrailleur. Il a ajouté  à cette profession  depuis 2004  la vente de quincaillerie, de portable, de télévision. Il achète ses produits au Grand marché de Lomé et revend  à Baguida. Il désire ce premier prêt pour acheter  04 poste téléviseur, 08 ventilateurs, 05 balances et des chargeurs portables pour revendre afin d’avoir de bénéfice pour  assurer un avenir meilleur à toute sa famille et avoir plus tard sa propre maison.
texts.en: A father of one child, Mr. O. is a man who is married to a retailer. He is a 30-year-old scrap metal dealer. Since 2004, he has added to this profession the sale of hardware good, mobile phones, and televisions. He buys his products at the Grand Market of Lomé and resells them in Baguida. He would like this initial loan to buy 4 television sets, 8 electric fans, 5 scales, and some phone chargers in order to resell them.  He may then have the profits for ensuring a better future for his whole family and for having his own house later on.

loans.use: to buy hardware goods, mobile phones, and television sets

loans.name: Duval Enrique

texts.es: Duval Enrique se dedica al destace de cerdos. Tiene más 11 años que se dedica a este negocio. El tiempo que ha adquirido con este negocio ha sido muy importantes, ya que la permitido obtener experiencia con sus clientes y el negocio. Duval tiene un hijo a su cargo tiene que brindarle estudios, alimentos y vestimenta ya que él es un padre responsable y quiere otorgarle a su hijo lo necesario. El motivo de este crédito es para la compra de mas cerdos, alimentos para ellos mismos y poder invertir en su negocio.
texts.en: Duval Enrique's business is slaughtering pigs.  He has been in this business for more than 11 years.  The length of time he has been in this business is very important as it has allowed him to gain experience with his customers and his business.  Duval has one child in his care who he has to provide with an education, food and clothes.  He is a responsible father and would like to provide for his son's needs.  Duval is requesting this loan to buy more pigs, feed for the pigs, and to invest in his business.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and feed for them
